letters.description: Evaluate the client's energetic field to identify specific chakra imbalances and frequency disruptions.
Develop a customized healing roadmap mapping psychological symptoms to their corresponding energy centers.
Apply targeted clearing techniques to release stagnant energy and emotional trauma stored within the chakras.
Channel life-force energy into depleted centers to restore vitality and optimal rotational flow.
Stabilize the newly balanced vibrations through grounding practices and somatic integration.
Establish daily energetic hygiene and lifestyle adjustments to maintain long-term chakra health.
Integrate the energetic shifts into the client’s physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being.
